## Checklist

### General
- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guide](docs/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the project's conventions
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally

### For Plugin Submissions
- [ ] Plugin follows the schema in [docs/SCHEMA.md](docs/SCHEMA.md)
- [ ] All agents have proper YAML frontmatter (`name` and `description`)
- [ ] All commands have proper YAML frontmatter (`name` and `description`)
- [ ] `plugin.json` is valid JSON
- [ ] Added plugin entry to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
- [ ] Updated category's `plugins` array in `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
- [ ] Completed the [Submission Checklist](templates/CHECKLIST.md)

### Testing
- [ ] Tested with Claude Code locally
- [ ] All agents invoke correctly
- [ ] All commands produce expected output
